data.name: ReadServiceProvider1
data.value: select SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, USER_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_INITIAL, ROLE_CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER where LAST_NAME >= @lastName order by LAST_NAME

data.name: ReadServiceProvider2
data.value: select SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, USER_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_INITIAL, ROLE_CODE, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER where USER_ID >= @userId order by USER_ID
